mapper.select: select comcommentid, comcommentcontent, comuserid, comcreatedate, comid from communitycomment where comid = #{comid} and comcommentisdelete='N'
select comcommentid, comcommentcontent, comuserid, comcreatedate, comid from communitycomment where comuserid = #{comuserid} and comcommentisdelete='N'
mapper.insert: insert into communitycomment(comcommentcontent, comuserid, comcreatedate, comid) values(#{comcommentcontent}, #{comuserid}, #{comcreatedate}, #{comid})
